class.name: usb_cam_controllers/CameraInfoController
class.description: This controller publishes camera info whose timestamp is synchronized to a packet read by the hardware. The controller expects a usb_cam_hardware_interface::PacketInterface as hardware interface.

class.name: usb_cam_controllers/UYVYController
class.description: This controller publishes images by converting pixel formats (UYVY -> 24bit BGR) The controller expects a usb_cam_hardware_interface::PacketInterface as hardware interface.

class.name: usb_cam_controllers/YUYVController
class.description: This controller publishes images by converting pixel formats (YUYV -> 24bit BGR) The controller expects a usb_cam_hardware_interface::PacketInterface as hardware interface.
